title: Mobile Microlearning Design for Science-Based e-Learning Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science and mathematics knowledge at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: Requires interactive learning design using LMS platforms like Edmodo in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Focuses on implementing social presence through learner collaboration and educator feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can create a 3-minute microlearning content explaining basic concepts of optics and light on the Edmodo platform.
Learners improve science problem-solving skills by 20% through peer evaluation and feedback exchange in mobile environments.
Learners achieve 4 or higher (out of 5) in usability and satisfaction with e-learning systems based on the USE questionnaire criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
